title: Open Source Developer
description: Developed open-source solutions, advancing knowledge management, signal processing, and developer tools.

content.content: Developed a machine-learning plugin in TypeScript for Obsidian, designed to automate networked note-taking and enhance knowledge management workflows. Launching February 2023.

items: Created 7 Python projects translating complex signal/audio processing algorithms from C++ to Python for accessibility and clarity.
Designed reusable interfaces to simplify the integration of advanced audio features.
Built Vue.js and React applications to help developers dynamically showcase their portfolios.
Focused on modularity and ease of customization for user-friendly experiences.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Advanced the SaaS e-health application for over three years, improving mental health service delivery in the Netherlands

content.content: Led the final stage of a business-critical project, migrating and translating 100M+ rows of data.

items: Tripled team productivity during two critical weeks by doubling my working hours and motivating co-workers to increase their commitments in support of urgent needs.
Reduced script runtime from 336 hours to 12, optimizing its performance by leveraging my understanding of low-level mechanics in Python, Pandas, and SQL.
Avoided the typical 2x-5x effort increase in late-stage changes by architecting scalable, testable, and modular software early in the project, ensuring seamless final-stage additions.
Reduced post-launch fallout from two anticipated weeks of chaos to a few minor issues by prioritizing and mentoring the team in creating a rich automated test suite, covering 95%.
Led workshops focused on TDD, AI tools, and PyTest, transforming Friday afternoon lulls into opportunities for knowledge-sharing, further collaborating on advanced SQL and core code principles.
Doubled collaboration between IT and stakeholders by simplifying and presenting complex topics, resulting in clear, actionable insights and encouraging more engaged discussions and questions.
Saved weeks of misdirected efforts by developing data visualizations and access tools driving key decisions, enabling secure, independent data retrieval, and freeing up development time.
Reduced platform downtime from hours per month to mere minutes by automating legacy system deployments, supporting cloud migration, and enhancing DevOps with GitLab CI/CD pipelines.

Mitigated major cybersecurity risks by a factor of 10 to 1,000 through identifying vulnerabilities, implementing Snyk for dependency monitoring, advocating for best practices, and actively supporting cyberattack responses.
Eliminated costly knowledge silos by driving documentation from one entry per month to multiple per week through the creation of a frictionless contribution system.

title: Front-end Developer
description: Developed a responsive website showcasing eco-friendly maritime initiatives, featuring an interactive map and dynamic content management using WordPress.

content.content: This project showcased environmentally friendly maritime initiatives across the Netherlands.

items: Implemented a user-friendly front-end, ensuring the website's responsiveness and interactive features such as a map view and dynamic card listings.
Developed the back-end infrastructure using WordPress, facilitating easy content management and configuration for non-technical users.
Worked closely with designers to translate visual concepts into functional web components, maintaining consistency to the initial design specifications.

title: Lead Developer
description: Led the development of an interactive web application for visualizing maritime emissions.

items: Managed the project's entire lifecycle, from drafting detailed business proposals and negotiating contracts to overseeing product delivery.
Developed and deployed the applicationâ€™s front-end and back-end using Python and Django, integrating complex data visualization features that enhance user interaction.
Delivered a user-centric web application that significantly improved clients' understanding of maritime emissions, tailored to various ship types, maritime routes, and propulsion types.
The successful execution and client satisfaction with the project led to further engagements, securing two additional projects with the client.
